name: wesnothcfg.vim
description:
This is my attempt for a Wesnoth WML syntax file.

I'm not very skilled in Wesnoth WML so could there be any problems, please do not hesitate to send me an e-mail.
install_details:
install to ~/.vim/syntax

and add following into your ~/.vimrc:
    autocmd BufNewFile,BufRead *.cfg            setf wesnothcfg
